segments.text: I can't shake the feeling of impending disaster as I watch the water overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle creeps further across the floor, a silent warning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In stark contrast, the calm garden outside seems so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a painting of normalcy while chaos brews indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how the woman can miss all of this; her back is turned to the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet she looks so serene, just drying that plate with dedication.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she really that unaware, or is it willful ignorance?
segments.speaker: PAR
